original: Male naturist looking to share nudist activities - 52
translated: 裸体主义男为裸体活动找伴 - 52

original: I'm looking to meet some female nudists in or near Firefly Island who are under 35 and in good to great shape.  Fake breasts would be a plus.  I'm kind of new to this naturist thing but I love seagulling on top of rooftops. Just seeing people think it was a bird but it was me is so awesome.  So let's start off in the studio apartment I've rented on Crockett Avenue with a great roof.  I'm also married so I can't exactly go romping along the beach or streaking across the field at a Liberty Swingers game!  I just want to hang out naked, drink some wine on the roof, and spread seed below.    Btw, I'm 52yo, 275lb, 5"4 and I recently shaved off all my body hair.  Excited?  Intrigued?  Let's cast off society's cloth shackles or whatever it is you hippies like to say!
translated: 寻找Firefly Island附近的裸体主义女性，要求年龄35岁以下、体型优美，隆过胸的更好。裸体主义这块我还只是新手，但我很喜欢在屋顶上打飞机。下面的路人以为是鸟屎，但其实是我干的，这种感觉太棒了。我们就在单身公寓的屋顶上进行初次活动吧，租的公寓在Crockett大道。我已经结婚了，所以没法真的去沙滩上交尾，也不能在浪人队的比赛中裸奔。我只想在屋顶上光着身子喝酒，再向下面播撒子种。对了，我52岁，250斤，一米六二，最近刚把体毛脱完。兴奋了吗？好奇了吗？一起摆脱社会的服装束缚吧！用你们嬉皮士的说法也行！
